Coverage

Find the right travel insurance coverage

Don't just buy travel insurance, compare travel insurance. InsureMyTrip® is built for travelers to find the right travel insurance plan for their next trip. We offer hundreds of plans from top travel insurance companies in the industry. The plans fall into six primary groups: comprehensive, travel health insurance, emergency evacuation, Schengen visa and accidental death. Each plan type has a unique mixture of benefits; below you’ll find more details on the plan types to help you determine which is the right plan for your trip.

  • Comprehensive
  • Medical
  • Evacuation
  • Schengen Visa
  • Accidental Death
